description.txt: Would you like to start the PURL server now?

field.txt: 1) Hit http://localhost:8080/docs/index.html once the server is running. You may log into the server as 'admin' with the password 'password' and change the password after you have logged in by modifying the user record.
2) The PURL server will not be stopped when you quit the installer.
